analysis.description:
lolaToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/40/0xe155e84519612b40dafba5f4a5497a61b1c87d15.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xe155e84519612b40dafba5f4a5497a61b1c87d15.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xe155e84519612b40dafba5f4a5497a61b1c87d15.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/40/0xe155e84519612b40dafba5f4a5497a61b1c87d15.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xe155e84519612b40dafba5f4a5497a61b1c87d15.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
